registration.heading: Registration
registration.name: Name
registration.nameRequired: Name is required (minimum 2 characters, maximum 20 characters)
registration.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
registration.phoneInvalid: Please enter a valid phone number (e.g., 010xxxxxxxx)
registration.addressRequired: Please enter your address (minimum 3 characters, maximum 30 characters)
registration.nationalIdInvalid: Please enter a valid 14-digit national ID

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.description: We, Herfitk.com, act as intermediaries between craftsmen and clients. We help you connect with craftsmen in various specialties quickly and with the highest quality. Additionally, we assist craftsmen in showcasing their work to gain opportunities in multiple locations for a nominal fee.

business_hours.title: Business Hours
business_hours.hours: Mon – Fri …… 10 am – 8 pm, Sat, Sun ....… Closed

newsletter.title: Newsletter
newsletter.subscribeText: Subscribe to get the latest news, updates, and information.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.content: Thank you for visiting Herfia web. Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy outlines the types of personal information we receive and collect when you use Herfia web, as well as how we safeguard your information. By using Herfia web, you consent to the data practices described in this policy.

howWeUseInformation.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUseInformation.listItems: Provide and improve Herfia web services
howWeUseInformation.listItems2: Communicate with you about updates, promotions, and other relevant information
howWeUseInformation.listItems3: Analyze usage trends and optimize performance
howWeUseInformation.disclaimer: We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. However, we may share your information with trusted service providers who assist us in operating our website, conducting business, or servicing you, as long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.content: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at

termsofService.Byaccessing: By accessing or using Herfia web, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms of Service.
termsofService.mation: Permission is granted to temporarily download one copy of the materials (information or software) on Herfia web for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only.
termsofService.Thematerials: The materials on Herfia web are provided on an 'as is' basis. Herfia web makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims and negates all other warranties including, without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights.
